title: The Grain Cafe
description: Little cafe in a strip mall with lot parking. Makes all vegan food using salad greens, tempeh, vegan Daiya cheese. Has quesadilla appetizers, personal size pizzas, sandwiches, wraps, salads, breakfast crepes, daily cakes, and a large drinks menu. Opened in spring 2013 by former staff of Golden Mean Vegan Cafe in Santa Monica (not affiliated), and menu is similar. Free Wi-Fi. Prices cheap for food; moderated for drinks and cakes.
